description: Try our easy to follow Speedy Keralan Chicken Curry recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Indian curry,Quick & easy dinner,High protein,Spring,Low sugar,Dinner Made Easy,Chicken
name: Speedy Keralan Chicken Curry Recipe | Woolworths
recipeIngredient: 500g chicken thigh fillet, trimmed, cut into 3 cm pieces

recipeInstructions.text: Heat 2 tsp vegetable oil in a saucepan over medium-high heat. Add spices from kit and cook for 20 seconds or until fragrant.
Add chicken to pan and cook for 5 minutes or until lightly browned.
Add curry sauce from kit, 50ml water and beans. Bring to a simmer. Cook for 5 minutes or until chicken is cooked through and beans are tender.
Heat naan according to package instructions and serve with curry.
